title: Abigail Bassett
description:
Abigail Bassett is a freelance journalist, writer, podcast host, and television host. She's been published in Automobile magazine, Tech Crunch, Ars Technica, Fast Company, Forbes, and appeared on CNN. 

She just competed in the Rebelle Rally, driving a stock Porsche Cayenne S riding on 20" wheels and street tires. 1500 miles of offroad driving, sandstorms, crazy weather were just part of that 10-day event, and we hear all about it! Plus, old Volvos, off-road challenges, EV stuff, canoe building, and pets! 

Check out her content here: https://abigailbassett.com/ 

Recorded October 28, 2021 

 

Head to Policygenius.com/SMOKINGTIRE to get started right now. 

For a limited time, my listeners get their first month free - AND, after you’ve been a member, CrowdHealth will include a Fitness Wearable. That’s 30 days to try risk-free plus the Fitness Wearable. Just go to JoinCrowdHealth.com/fit and enter code Tire at sign up. 

Worry less and feel happier. Sign up for your trial at Noom.com/TIRE. 

Find Valvoline now at your local auto parts store.

Want to watch the live stream, get ad-free podcasts, or exclusive podcasts? Join our Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/thesmokingtirepodcast 

#cars #comedy #podcast 

Follow us! 

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman 

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman 

Click here for the most honest car reviews out there: https://www.youtube.com/thesmokingtire
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
